Texts.Chs: 把^orange;传送器核心^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给我。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Teleporter Core^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我急需你的帮助。我的传送器需要一个^orange;传送器核心^reset;才能完成，但^green;卖家发了个EMS快递^reset;导致我没时间了。希望你能在^orange;物质汇编机^reset;上制作一个。
Texts.Eng: I am in dire need of your assistance. I need a ^orange;Teleporter Core^reset; to finish my teleporter, but ^green;the courier delivering my supplies is late^reset; and I'm running out of time. You can craft one in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 没有^orange;传送器核心^reset;，你将不能制作某些有用的技术。另外，传送器简单又好玩！！！看，顺丰立马就把^green;你备用的传送器核心^reset;送来了。
Texts.Eng: Without ^orange;Teleporter Cores^reset;, you won't be able to craft several useful technologies. Plus, teleporters are just plain fun!!! Oh, there's the courier with ^green;your replacement core^reset;.
